---
title: Installation Overview
---

## Paths to Installation

The IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools supports the installation into a number of
Kubernetes-based cluster technologies. The tools can be installed into multiple clusters and support **IBM Kubernetes** and **Red Hat OpenShift** managed cluster environments. The installation process is built using **Terraform Infrastructure as Code**. For a more detailed explanation on this you can read the [Infrastructure as Code Guide](/guides/iasc).

- Complete the installation and setup of the [Prerequisites](/getting-started/pre-reqs) before starting any of the installations paths.

Select the approach that best suites your requirement:
- If its a brand new project or being managed by a _Cloud Administrator_, use the *New* path
- If you have an existing IBM Cloud managed cluster, use the *Existing* approach
- If you want to do local development on your laptop use *OpenShift 4 CodeReady Containers* path

<Row>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install New"
    subTitle="Create a new IBM Cloud managed cluster with all the Development Tools installed"
    href="/admin/installation-ibm-cloud"
    >

![](/images/sysadmins2.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install Existing"
    subTitle="Install the Development Tools into an existing IBM Cloud managed cluster"
    href="/admin/installation-existing"
    >

![](/images/sysadmins.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Install Red Hat CRC"
    subTitle="Install the Development Tools into Red Hat CodeReady Containers"
    href="/admin/installation-crc"
    >

![](/images/code2.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

After installation remember to complete these setup steps for **ArgoCD** and **Artifactory** to enable Artifact management and Continuous Delivery:

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink to="../../getting-started/argocd-setup">ArgoCD Setup</AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink to="../../getting-started/artifactory-setup">Artifactory Setup</AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>
